import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ReminderbookService } from '../services/reminderbook.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-reminders', templateUrl: './reminders.component.html', styleUrls: ['./reminders.component.css'] }) export class RemindersComponent { public remindersList: [{ noteId: number; noteHeader: string; noteText: string; reminderDate: Date; notesTags: [] }] | undefined; constructor(public reminderbook: ReminderbookService) { reminderbook.getReminders().subscribe(reminders => { this.remindersList = reminders; }) } }
